title: Divine
lyrics: amari ni mo moroi no ne kimochi wa tayasuku yurete yo ga akeru to kieru ko tae sagashite ru tada tachihadakaru kono Crossroad michishirube ni naru Starlight nee oshiete hoshii no i ku beki basho wo don na ni tookute kuji ke sou demo ten mei wo matteru ko re ga Destiny todoro kiut su arana mi ni maru de muryoku de chii sana watashi dake do umi sa e kit to warete soko ni mi chi wo tsuku ru itsu no hi ka We can be di vine (Whoo) sorezore no mi chi hi rakareta sono to ki kitto omoi dasu no desho kono nega i tomo ni ayunda michinori wo a kashi ni shi you eien ni We are always one (We are always one*) Ooh ooh whoa
